title: Biome and Terrain Generation
desc: Seedra implements full terrain and biome generation for Legacy Console Edition. Generate biome data for entire worlds, create visual biome maps, and search for specific biome combinations quickly and efficiently. The library simulates Minecraft's noise terrain generation algorithms to produce accurate terrain in a convenient and reusable way.
img_caption: Example biome map generated by Seedra at 1:1 scale
p1: Generate biome data for any seed, version, and world size
p2: Simulate 1:1 terrain generation for Legacy Console Edition
p3: Easily write efficient code for biome and terrain generation

title: Find Structures Easily
desc: The structure generation system can accurately locate Minecraft structures for any given seed by replicating the game's structure generation algorithms. Once a structure is located, its internal layout can be generated with room arrangements, pathways, and loot chest locations matching their in-game counterparts.
img_caption: Analyze structure layouts including room types and exact positions
p1: Configurable layout detail, from full to partial layouts
p2: Validated manually across hundreds of seeds for accuracy
p3: Enables loot and resource analysis within located structures

title: Find Loot
desc: The loot generation code can accurately determine the contents of any chest in the world based on the given Minecraft seed. By following Minecraft's exact sequence of generating the world, the code ensures that each chest's contents match what would appear in-game for the same seed including the correct enchantments.
img_caption: Accurately generates loot contents for structures
p1: Computes exact chest slot contents for any given structure
p2: Produces the actual in-game loot for that structure
p3: Supports console and version specific enchantments

title: Highly Optimized & Thread-Safe
desc: Designed for performance and reliability, Seedra is built with multithreading in mind to fully utilize modern multi-core processors. The library's thread-safe architecture allows concurrent operations without data corruption. It provides a clean and easy-to-use API, making it simple to integrate into larger applications or systems that require efficient seed analysis and world generation capabilities.
img_caption: Optimized for speed and stability in multithreaded environments
p1: Fully utilizes available CPU cores for maximum performance
p2: Thread-safe design ensures stable operation without crashes
p3: Provides a clean, easy-to-use API for integration with other systems
